### Numbers

123
10\,000
99\%
4.12$\pm$0.31

---

123
10\,000
99\%
4.12$\pm$0.31

### [concat] Operators

a+b-c*d<e>f!g|h:i'j,k(l)

---

<s>a+b-c*d<e>f!g|h:i'j,k(l)</s>

Extracting Content and Layout with Integrated \newline Reading Order for Documents

### \latex

\latex is not latex.

---

\latex <s>vf abg yngrk.</s>

### Verbatim text

\verb|<structured_text>| or \verb|<plain_text>| or~\verb|<no_text>|

---

\verb|<structured_text>| <s>be <latex>\verb|<plain_text>|</latex> be~</s>\verb|<no_text>|

### Anchor pass-through

foo <a0> bar

---

<s>sbb <a0> one</s>

### Escape <s> and <latex>

foo <s>bar</s> <latex>baz</latex>

---

<s>sbb <latex>\textless{}</latex>{}f>one<latex>\textless{}</latex>{}/f> <latex>\textless{}</latex>{}yngrk>onm<latex>\textless{}</latex>{}/yngrk></s>

### \mbox and \fbox

\mbox{foo}
\fbox{foo}

---

\mbox{<s>sbb</s>}
\fbox{<s>sbb</s>}

### [xfail] \framebox and \makebox

\framebox[x][y]{foo}
\makebox[x][y]{foo}

---

\framebox[x][y]{<s>sbb</s>}
\makebox[x][y]{<s>sbb</s>}

### [xfail] \parbox

\parbox{1cm}{foo}
\parbox[x][y][z]{1cm}{foo}

---

\parbox{1cm}{<s>sbb</s>}
\parbox[x][y][z]{1cm}{<s>sbb</s>}

### curly braces

{foo}

{
bar
}

---

{<s>sbb</s>}

{
<s>one</s>
}

### [concat] Escaped space

i.i.d.\ Gaussian noise
i.i.d.\@ Gaussian noise

---

<s>i.i.d.</s>\ <s>Gaussiannoisei.i.d.</s>\@ <s>Gaussiannoise</s>

### Non-breaking space

foo~bar

\subsection{}~\label{asdf}

---

<s>sbb~one</s>

\subsection{}~\label{asdf}

### \em, \bf

foo {\em bar} {\bf baz}

---

<s>sbb</s> {\em <s>one</s>} {\bf <s>onm</s>}

### \textit, \textbf

foo \textit{bar} \textbf{baz}

---

<s>sbb</s> \textit{<s>one</s>} \textbf{<s>onm</s>}

### [xfail] \underline

\underline x
\underline1

---

\underline k
\underline1

astrof{\'\i}sica
ci\^encia
gar\c{c}on

irm\~a
observat\'orio
kes\"ay\"o
se\~nor
stra\ss e

<s>ciência</s>
<s>garçon</s>
<s>Genève</s>
<s>irmã</s>
<s>observatório</s>
<s>kesäyö</s>
<s>señor</s>
<s>straße</s>

### Percentages

less than 5\% water

---

<s>yrff guna 5\% jngre</s>

### [xfail] Quotes

`single'
``double''

---

<s>‘fvatyr’</s>
<s>“qbhoyr”</s>
